20110119020004.000|20110119020006.000|CC1|CAME TO THIS CAMPUS RIGHT AFTER 
20110119020006.000|20110119020008.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING.

20110119020009.000|20110119020012.000|CC1|HE BROUGHT A GUN TO SCHOOL.

20110119020014.000|20110119020015.000|CC1|THAT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS    
20110119020015.000|20110119020018.000|CC1|PARTICULAR SHOOTING CAME INTO A 
20110119020018.000|20110119020019.000|CC1|CLASSROOM.                      
20110119020019.000|20110119020021.000|CC1|IT APPEARS THAT HE SAID THE     
20110119020021.000|20110119020023.000|CC1|BACKPACK DOWN ON THE DESK.      
20110119020023.000|20110119020024.000|CC1|A GUN THAT WAS INSIDE THAT      
20110119020024.000|20110119020027.000|CC1|BACKPACK DISCHARGED.            
20110119020027.000|20110119020028.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HEALTH CLASS AT    
20110119020028.000|20110119020030.000|CC1|GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL, A          
20110119020030.000|20110119020032.000|CC1|17-YEAR-OLD STUDENT IS THE ONE  
20110119020032.000|20110119020034.000|CC1|WHO OWNED THE BACKPACK.         
20110119020034.000|20110119020036.000|CC1|ONE BULLET HIT A BOY IN THE     
20110119020036.000|20110119020037.000|CC1|NECK.                           
20110119020037.000|20110119020039.000|CC1|THE SAME BULLET THEN WENT INTO  
20110119020039.000|20110119020040.000|CC1|THE TEMPLE IN OF THE SKULL OF A 
20110119020040.000|20110119020041.000|CC1|15 YEAR-OLD GIRL.               
20110119020041.000|20110119020043.000|CC1|THE TWO STUDENTS WERE STANDING  
20110119020043.000|20110119020044.000|CC1|NEXT TO EACH OTHER.             
20110119020044.000|20110119020045.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE SHOOTING  
20110119020045.000|20110119020048.000|CC1|LASTED RAN FROM THE CLASSROOM IN
20110119020048.000|20110119020051.000|CC1|AN ALL-OUT SEARCH AS 3,000      
20110119020051.000|20110119020054.000|CC1|STUDENTS WERE ON LOCKDOWN.      
20110119020054.000|20110119020056.000|CC1|>> IF IT IS AN ISSUE OF A GUN   
20110119020056.000|20110119020057.000|CC1|THAT ACCIDENTAL DISCHARGES IT   
20110119020057.000|20110119020059.000|CC1|WILL MOST LIKELY HAVE TO BE AN  
20110119020059.000|20110119020102.000|CC1|AUTOMATIC WEAPON AS OPPOSED TO A

20110119020714.000|20110119020716.000|CC1|IT APPEARS HE IS ON PROBATION,  
20110119020716.000|20110119020721.000|CC1|MAY HAVE BEEN FOR QUITE PRIOR TO
20110119020721.000|20110119020721.000|CC1|THIS.
